name: Easy Pistachio-Crusted Salmon
author: Lola
summary: This is a very easy salmon recipe that tastes great with very few ingredients.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup finely chopped pistachio nuts
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Stir mustard, maple syrup, salt, and pepper together in a bowl
Place salmon fillets skin-side down onto the prepared baking sheet and spread mustard mixture on top
Bake in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes
Sprinkle pistachios on top of the salmon
Bake until salmon flakes easily with a fork, about 10 more minutes
